name: Flag Flipper
description:
Collect as many coins as you can!Controls:
  • Space/W/Up: Jump
  •  Shift: Dash
  • R: Reverse
  • M: Mute audio
Mechanics:
  • Player has a maximum of 3 jumps
  • A jump regenerates every half second, or when the player presses reverse (R)
  • After 20 seconds the walls speed up significantly
  • Beware the falling blocks!
Source Code:

https://github.com/melo484b/flag-flipper

Acknowledgements:
  • The font is Kenney Future
  • The SFX were made with jsfxr
  • Music: Trap Powerful Intro 22 by TaigaSoundProd
